featureDescription.name: GoodQuality
featureDescription.description: Quality of Document without skipped and unknown Words

featureDescription.name: UnknownQuality
featureDescription.description: Quality of Document without skipped Words

featureDescription.name: RightWords
featureDescription.description: Number of correct words in the Document

featureDescription.name: WrongWords
featureDescription.description: Number of wrong words in the Document

featureDescription.name: UnknownWords
featureDescription.description: Number of unknown words in the Document

featureDescription.name: SkippedWords
featureDescription.description: Number of Skipped words in the Document

featureDescription.name: PercentRight
featureDescription.description: Percentage of correct words in the document without skipped words

featureDescription.name: PercentWrong
featureDescription.description: Percentage of wrong words in the document without skipped words

featureDescription.name: PercentUnknown
featureDescription.description: Percentage of unknown words in the document without skipped words

featureDescription.name: PercentRightWithoutSkipped
featureDescription.description: Percentage of correct words in the document

featureDescription.name: PercentWrongWithoutSkipped
featureDescription.description: Percentage of wrong words in the document

featureDescription.name: PercentUnknownWithoutSkipped
featureDescription.description: Percentage of unknown words in the document
